transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello haji sir.

Customer: Ji namaste aur sir kaise hain?

Executive: Ji badhiya.

Customer: Bol Siddhant bol raha hu sir.

Executive: Siddhant ji boliye.

Customer: Dhul ji baat kar rahe hain na?

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Ji pehchana nahi kya sir?

Executive: Pehchan gaya wo India mart help likha hua aata hai aapka number save hai uske naam se aayega to naam.

Customer: Achcha naam nahi aa raha hai.

Executive: Naam nahi aa raha wo naam to save hai mere paas mein whatsapp wala tha. Ji bataye Siddhant ji.

Customer: Main keh raha hu sir kal se kuch response mila hai thoda bahut?

Executive: Ji abhi to wohi leads aa rahi hai yaar phir bhi main kar raha hu sir meri taraf se koshish.

Customer: Haan haan abhi to wohi hogi but ek aad lead koi mil jaye. Aap dekh raha hu na wohi aa rahi hai 700 800 sabko kar raha hu main 700 wale ko bhi kar raha hu aur 800 wale sabko kar raha hu lekin jawab wo same hi aata hai na.

Executive: 700 800 wali ko mat karo. 700 800 wali jo hai usko mat karo usse jyada 1000 usse jyada usse jyada phir 1000 wali aa rahi hai batao kya kare Siddhant ji. Fir aap bologe aap use nahi kar rahe ho.

Customer: Haan. Haan.

Executive: Nahi main nahi sir ye to aap tak mujhe aap use nahi kar rahe ho main aapko sirf ye bata raha hu ki agar 700 800 tak ki aa rahi hai to subah subah bhi use kiya hai maine. Haan aur abhi ek Gadag Karnataka ka lead aaya hai 1200 square feet ka. Theek hai Karnataka kaise leke jayega wo 1200 feet. Kitne kilometer hai wo 2000 kilometer hai. 1000 kilometer hai aur aapne 15000 2000 2000 kilometer hai. Haan kareeb 15 20 30 yani 30000 main keh raha hu abhi ya to aap mujhe hai na Siddhant ji aadhe ghante mein call karo. Thoda sa. Thoda sa abhi subah subah factory aaya hu. To dopahar mein karna call aap mujhe.

Executive: Theek hai theek hai main aapko thodi der mein call le leta hu theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good leads.

- Customer is getting leads from far locations.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested not to use 700-800 leads.

- Executive asked to call in the afternoon.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer in the afternoon.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, response
